description:
Unlocks the following items: S. Dymlos 

S. (Swordian) Dymlos
A weapon wielded by Stahn Aileron in Tales of Destiny.
BGM Change: "Bare Its Fangs"

Sword Skin/Tales series DLC. ATK 50, DEF 50. Blaze Attack.
Alters Sword Appearance to "Swordian Dymlos" and alters battle music.

*This item is included in the Deco Item: "Tales of" Set.
name: Deco Item: S. Dymlos
